Test Name: Adaptor Protein 3 Beta2 (AP3B2) Antibody, Cell-Binding Assay
Purpose: To detect and quantify AP3B2 antibodies in spinal fluid specimens using a cell-binding assay.
Equipment: Incubator (37°C ± 2°C), cell culture hood, centrifuge, fluorescence microscope, calibrated pipettes, refrigerator/freezer
